.. _`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.index.__module__`:

===========
FormControl
===========

.. contents:: Local Navigation
   :local:
   :depth: 2

Description
===========



This module provides several components that are based on the different
``<input/>`` components that HTML5 provides:

- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.Button.__default__`
- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.BitmapIcon.__module__`
- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.CheckBox.__module__`
- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.ComboBox.__default__`
- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.ComboBoxCatalog.__default__`
- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.Calendar.__default__`
- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.Email.__module__`
- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.NumericEdit.__default__`
- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.Password.__module__`
- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.Radio.__default__`
- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.TextArea.__default__`
- :ref:`cs-web-components-base-formcontrols.TextInput.__default__`
